thread.title: Goldman Sachs Raises $2.5 Billion to Buy Stakes in Private-Equity Firms

author: Dawn Lim
title: Goldman Sachs Raises $2.5 Billion to Buy Stakes in Private-Equity Firms

organizations.name: private-equity firms goldman sachs group inc.

text:
Goldman Sachs Group Inc. raised $2.5 billion to buy minority stakes in private-equity firms, betting on an industry that is commanding increasing influence as more businesses choose to stay private longer.
Petershill, a group within Goldmanâ€™s asset-management arm, gathered more than the $2 billion it targeted. An announcement is expected as soon as Thursday.
